metadata.name: Suspicious Windows ANONYMOUS LOGON Local Account Created
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of suspicious accounts similar to ANONYMOUS LOGON, such as using additional spaces. Created as an covering detection for exclusion of Logon Type 3 from ANONYMOUS LOGON accounts.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND metadata.event_code = 4720 AND contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('anonymous')) AND contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('logon')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of suspicious accounts similar to ANONYMOUS LOGON, such as using additional spaces. Created as an covering detection for exclusion of Logon Type 3 from ANONYMOUS LOGON accounts.
